doc:
Hardee Kirkland https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hardee_Kirkland 0 Hardee Kirkland (May 23, 1868 – February 18, 1929) was an American film actor and director of the silent era and also appeared on stage. Kirkland was born in Savannah, Georgia, the son of former Confederate Brigadier General William Whedbee Kirkland, and the older brother of the actress Elizabeth Kirkland, who performed as Odette Tyler, he appeared in 41 films between 1915 and 1925. He also directed 33 films between 1912 and 1914. He died in California at the age of 60. Hardee_Kirkland ( May_23_,_1868 – February_18_,_1929 ) was an_American_film_actor_and_director of the_silent_era and also appeared on stage . Kirkland was_born in Savannah , Georgia , the_son of former_Confederate_Brigadier_General_William_Whedbee_Kirkland , and the_older_brother of the_actress_Elizabeth_Kirkland , who performed as Odette_Tyler , he appeared in 41_films between 1915_and_1925 . He also directed 33_films between 1912_and_1914 . He died in California at the_age of 60 .
